verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is he who <S%H7919>considers<s%> the <S%H1800>helpless;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> him in a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H9567>trouble.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H8104>protect<s%> him, and <S%H2421>keep<s%> him <S%H2421>alive,<s%> And he shall be <S%H833>called<s%> <S%H833>blessed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth;<s%> And do not <S%H5414>give<s%> him over to the <S%H5315>desire<s%> of his <S%H340>enemies.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5582>sustain<s%> him upon his <S%H1741>sickbed<s%><S%H6210>;<s%> In his <S%H2483>illness,<s%> Thou dost <S%H2015>restore<s%> him to <S%H3605>health.<s%> <S%H4904><s%>
As for me, I <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me; <S%H7495>Heal<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> for I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Thee."
My <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> against me, <S%H4970>"When<s%> will he <S%H4191>die,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> perish?"

And <S%H518>when<s%> he <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> [me], he <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H7723>falsehood;<s%> His <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6908>gathers<s%> <S%H205>wickedness<s%> to itself; When he <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> he <S%H1696>tells<s%> it.
<S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H3907>whisper<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; <S%H5921>Against<s%> me they <S%H2803>devise<s%> my <S%H9567>hurt,<s%> [saying,]
"A <S%H1100>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3332>poured<s%> out upon him, That <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> he will not <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H3254>again.<s%>"

<S%H1571>Even<s%> my <S%H7965>close<s%> <S%H376>friend,<s%> <S%H7965><s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H982>trusted,<s%> Who <S%H398>ate<s%> my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> Has <S%H1431>lifted<s%> up his <S%H6119>heel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
But Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, and <S%H6965>raise<s%> me up, That I may <S%H9608>repay<s%> them.
By <S%H384>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that Thou art <S%H2654>pleased<s%> with me, <S%H3588>Because<s%> my <S%H340>enemy<s%> does not <S%H7321>shout<s%> in <S%H7321>triumph<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.
As for me, Thou dost <S%H8551>uphold<s%> me in my <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> And Thou dost <S%H5324>set<s%> me in Thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> From <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
